document_data.name: Gharri Delark
document_data.mainbody: '''Gharri Delark''' was a member of the [[daemonfey]] in the [[1370 DR|Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Gharri had won the grudging respect of Baron [[Xhalth]].
document_data.History: Gharri was an adventurer member of the [[Company of the Jaded Heart]]. They went to explore the ruin of [[Hellgate Keep]] under orders of the [[Arcane Brotherhood]]. However, the [[daemonfey]] killed most of them. Gharri and the surviving members pledged their loyalty to the [[fey'ri]].
